kurs_name.label: Kursname
kurs_name.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kurs_beschreibung.label: Kursbeschreibung
kurs_beschreibung.description: A string value that can contain multiple lines of text (or `null`).

kurs_zeitplan.label: Zeitplan
kurs_zeitplan.description:
A specific moment in time consisting of year, month, day, hour and minute. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T<HH>:<MM>` or `null`.

For example: `1879-03-14T11:30`.

kurs_ort.label: Ort
kurs_ort.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kursleiter_vorname.label: Vorname
kursleiter_vorname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kursleiter_nachname.label: Nachname
kursleiter_nachname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kursleiter_kontakt.label: Kontakt
kursleiter_kontakt.description: A valid telephone number. Might include country prefix and should include area code (or `null`).

zugewiesener_kurs.label: Zugewiesener Kurs
zugewiesener_kurs.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.

teilnehmer_vorname.label: Vorname
teilnehmer_vorname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

teilnehmer_nachname.label: Nachname
teilnehmer_nachname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

angemeldete_kurse.label: Angemeldete Kurse
angemeldete_kurse.description:
Arbitrary number of referenced LivingApp records from a target lookup app.

The field value will be a list of valid record URLs in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>`.
